name: Cinder Blox
description:
Here is a game simple enough everyone can enjoy but will challenge the most avid gamer.

Stacking Cinder Blox, how hard can it really be? Well, get ready to be surprised with this extremely fun and addictive new game! The object of the game is to stack the Cinder Blox on top of each other and see how far you can get. Easy right? Not so fast! The Cinder Blox move from Left to Right.. Tap anywhere on the screen to stop the Cinderblox, right after you stop the Cinder Blox another one will appear, try to stack all the blox to get to the top. But, careful, the blox move at a random speed and it's not as easy as you think. After every level the Blox decrease by one making it even harder.
